refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The GstRTSPStream object manages the data transport for one stream. It is created from a payloader element and a source pad that produce the RTP packets for the stream.
With gst_rtsp_stream_join_bin() the streaming elements are added to the bin and rtpbin. gst_rtsp_stream_leave_bin() removes the elements again.

The GstRTSPStream will use the configured addresspool, as set with gst_rtsp_stream_set_address_pool(), to allocate multicast addresses for the stream. With gst_rtsp_stream_get_multicast_address() you can get the configured address.
With gst_rtsp_stream_get_server_port() you can get the port that the server will use to receive RTCP. This is the part that the clients will use to send RTCP to.
With gst_rtsp_stream_add_transport() destinations can be added where the stream should be sent to. Use gst_rtsp_stream_remove_transport() to remove the destination again.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_new ()
refsect2.para: Create a new media stream with index idx that handles RTP data on pad and has a payloader element payloader if pad is a source pad or a depayloader element payloader if pad is a sink pad.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a new GstRTSPStream.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_get_index ()
refsect2.para: Get the stream index.
Return: the stream index.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_get_srcpad ()
refsect2.para: Get the srcpad associated with stream .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the srcpad. Unref after usage.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_get_control ()
refsect2.para: Get the control string to identify this stream.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the control string. g_free() after usage.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_set_control ()
refsect2.para: Set the control string in stream .

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_has_control ()
refsect2.para: Check if stream has the control string control .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE is stream has control as the control string

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_get_mtu ()
refsect2.para: Get the configured MTU in the payloader of stream .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the MTU of the payloader.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_set_mtu ()
refsect2.para: Configure the mtu in the payloader of stream to mtu .

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_get_dscp_qos ()
refsect2.para: Get the configured DSCP QoS in of the outgoing sockets.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the DSCP QoS value of the outgoing sockets, or -1 if disbled.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_set_dscp_qos ()
refsect2.para: Configure the dscp qos of the outgoing sockets to dscp_qos .

entry.para: a new dscp qos value (0-63, or -1 to disable)

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_set_profiles ()
refsect2.para: Configure the allowed profiles for stream .

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_get_profiles ()
refsect2.para: Get the allowed profiles of stream .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a GstRTSPProfile

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_get_protocols ()
refsect2.para: Get the allowed protocols of stream .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a GstRTSPLowerTrans

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_set_protocols ()
refsect2.para: Configure the allowed lower transport for stream .

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_get_retransmission_time ()
refsect2.para: Get the amount of time to store retransmission data.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the amount of time to store retransmission data.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_set_retransmission_time ()
refsect2.para: Set the amount of time to store retransmission packets.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_set_buffer_size ()
refsect2.para: Set the size of the UDP transmission buffer (in bytes) Needs to be set before the stream is joined to a bin.
Since: 1.6

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_get_buffer_size ()
refsect2.para: Get the size of the UDP transmission buffer (in bytes)

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the size of the UDP TX buffer

refsect2.para: Since: 1.6

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_is_transport_supported ()
refsect2.para: Check if transport can be handled by stream

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if transport can be handled by stream .

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_get_address_pool ()
refsect2.para: Get the GstRTSPAddressPool used as the address pool of stream .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the GstRTSPAddressPool of stream . g_object_unref() after usage.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_set_address_pool ()
refsect2.para: configure pool to be used as the address pool of stream .

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_reserve_address ()
refsect2.para: Reserve address and port as the address and port of stream . The original GstRTSPAddress is cached and copy is returned, so freeing the return value won't release the address from the pool.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the GstRTSPAddress of stream or NULL when the address could be reserved. gst_rtsp_address_free() after usage.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_join_bin ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gst_rtsp_stream_join_bin (GstRTSPStream *stream, GstBin *bin, GstElement *rtpbin, GstState state);
refsect2.para: Join the GstBin bin that contains the element rtpbin .
stream will link to rtpbin , which must be inside bin . The elements added to bin will be set to the state given in state .

entry.para: the target state of the new elements

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE on success.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_leave_bin ()
refsect2.para: Remove the elements of stream from bin .
Return: TRUE on success.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_get_server_port ()
refsect2.para: Fill server_port with the port pair used by the server. This function can only be called when stream has been joined.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_get_multicast_address ()
refsect2.para: Get the multicast address of stream for family . The original GstRTSPAddress is cached and copy is returned, so freeing the return value won't release the address from the pool.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the GstRTSPAddress of stream or NULL when no address could be allocated. gst_rtsp_address_free() after usage.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_get_rtpsession ()
refsect2.para: Get the RTP session of this stream.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: The RTP session of this stream. Unref after usage.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_get_ssrc ()
refsect2.para: Get the SSRC used by the RTP session of this stream. This function can only be called when stream has been joined.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_get_rtpinfo ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean gst_rtsp_stream_get_rtpinfo (GstRTSPStream *stream, guint *rtptime, guint *seq, guint *clock_rate, GstClockTime *running_time);
refsect2.para: Retrieve the current rtptime, seq and running-time. This is used to construct a RTPInfo reply header.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE when rtptime, seq and running-time could be determined.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_get_caps ()
refsect2.para: Retrieve the current caps of stream .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the GstCaps of stream . use gst_caps_unref() after usage.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_get_pt ()
refsect2.para: Get the stream payload type.
Return: the stream payload type.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_recv_rtcp ()
refsect2.para: Handle an RTCP buffer for the stream. This method is usually called when a message has been received from a client using the TCP transport.
This function takes ownership of buffer .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a GstFlowReturn.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_recv_rtp ()
refsect2.para: Handle an RTP buffer for the stream. This method is usually called when a message has been received from a client using the TCP transport.
This function takes ownership of buffer .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a GstFlowReturn.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_add_transport ()
refsect2.para: Add the transport in trans to stream . The media of stream will then also be send to the values configured in trans .
stream must be joined to a bin.
trans must contain a valid GstRTSPTransport.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if trans was added

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_remove_transport ()
refsect2.para: Remove the transport in trans from stream . The media of stream will not be sent to the values configured in trans .
stream must be joined to a bin.
trans must contain a valid GstRTSPTransport.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if trans was removed

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_get_rtp_socket ()
refsect2.para: Get the RTP socket from stream for a family .
stream must be joined to a bin.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the RTP socket or NULL if no socket could be allocated for family . Unref after usage.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_get_rtcp_socket ()
refsect2.para: Get the RTCP socket from stream for a family .
stream must be joined to a bin.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the RTCP socket or NULL if no socket could be allocated for family . Unref after usage.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_set_blocked ()
refsect2.para: Blocks or unblocks the dataflow on stream .

entry.para: boolean indicating we should block or unblock

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE on success

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_is_blocking ()
refsect2.para: Check if stream is blocking on a GstBuffer.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if stream is blocking

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_query_stop ()
refsect2.para: Query the stop of the stream in GST_FORMAT_TIME. This only considers the RTP parts of the pipeline and not the RTCP parts.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the stop could be queried

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_query_position ()
refsect2.para: Query the position of the stream in GST_FORMAT_TIME. This only considers the RTP parts of the pipeline and not the RTCP parts.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the position could be queried

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_update_crypto ()
refsect2.para: Update the new crypto information for ssrc in stream . If information for ssrc did not exist, it will be added. If information for ssrc existed, it will be replaced. If crypto is NULL, it will be removed from stream .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if crypto could be updated

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_set_pt_map ()
refsect2.para: Configure a pt map between pt and caps .

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_request_aux_sender ()
refsect2.para: Creating a rtxsend bin

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a GstElement.

refsect2.para: Since: 1.6

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_seekable ()
refsect2.para: Checks whether the individual stream is seekable.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if stream is seekable, else FALSE.

refsect2.title: GstRTSPStreamTransportFilterFunc ()
refsect2.para: This function will be called by the gst_rtsp_stream_transport_filter(). An implementation should return a value of GstRTSPFilterResult.
When this function returns GST_RTSP_FILTER_REMOVE, trans will be removed from stream .
A return value of GST_RTSP_FILTER_KEEP will leave trans untouched in stream .
A value of GST_RTSP_FILTER_REF will add trans to the result GList of gst_rtsp_stream_transport_filter().

entry.para: user data that has been given to gst_rtsp_stream_transport_filter()

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a GstRTSPFilterResult.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_stream_transport_filter ()
refsect2.programlisting: GList * gst_rtsp_stream_transport_filter (GstRTSPStream *stream, GstRTSPStreamTransportFilterFunc func, gpointer user_data);
refsect2.para:
Call func for each transport managed by stream . The result value of func
determines what happens to the transport. func will be called with stream
locked so no further actions on stream can be performed from func .
If func returns GST_RTSP_FILTER_REMOVE, the transport will be removed from stream .
If func returns GST_RTSP_FILTER_KEEP, the transport will remain in stream .
If func returns GST_RTSP_FILTER_REF, the transport will remain in stream but will also be added with an additional ref to the result GList of this function..
When func is NULL, GST_RTSP_FILTER_REF will be assumed for each transport.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a GList with all transports for which func returned GST_RTSP_FILTER_REF. After usage, each element in the GList should be unreffed before the list is freed.

refsect2.title: struct GstRTSPStream
refsect2.para: The definition of a media stream.

refsect2.title: The “control” property
refsect2.para: The control string for this stream.
Flags: Read / Write
Default value: NULL

refsect2.title: The “profiles” property
refsect2.para: Allowed transfer profiles.
Flags: Read / Write
Default value: GST_RTSP_PROFILE_AVP

refsect2.title: The “protocols” property
refsect2.para: Allowed lower transport protocols.
Flags: Read / Write
Default value: GST_RTSP_LOWER_TRANS_UDP | GST_RTSP_LOWER_TRANS_UDP_MCAST | GST_RTSP_LOWER_TRANS_TCP

refsect2.title: The “new-rtcp-encoder” signal
refsect2.para: Flags: Run Last

refsect2.title: The “new-rtp-encoder” signal
refsect2.para: Flags: Run Last
